mapper.select: select * from ( SELECT RFI.ID, RFI.BUSINESSID, RFI.PROJECTNAME, RFI.PROJECTNUM, (SELECT S.NAME FROM SYS_USER S WHERE S.UUID = RFI.CREATEBY) AS CREATEBY, RFI.PROJECT_MODEL_IDS, (SELECT O.NAME FROM SYS_ORG O WHERE O.ORGPKVALUE = RFI.PERTAINAREAID) AS PERTAINAREANAME, (SELECT SU.NAME FROM SYS_USER SU WHERE SU.UUID = RFI.REVIEWPERSONID) REVIEWPERSONNAME, RFI.ISURGENT, RFR.CREATE_DATE, RFR.CONTROLLER_VAL FROM RCM_PRE_INFO RFI, RCM_PRE_REPORT RFR WHERE RFI.STAGE = '3.5' AND RFI.WF_STATE = '2' AND RFI.BUSINESSID = RFR.BUSINESSID AND RFR.CREATE_DATE IS NOT NULL and RFI.REVIEWPERSONID=#{psfzr} ) t where 1 = 1 and t.projectName like '%${projectName}%' and t.createby like '%${createBy}%' and t.pertainareaName like '%${pertainareaname}%' order by ${orderBy}

select t.* from (SELECT RFI.ID, RFI.BUSINESSID, RFI.PROJECTNAME, RFI.PROJECTNUM, (SELECT S.NAME FROM SYS_USER S WHERE S.UUID = RFI.CREATEBY) AS CREATEBY, (SELECT su.NAME FROM Sys_User su WHERE su.uuid = rfi.reviewpersonid) reviewpersonname, RFI.PROJECT_MODEL_IDS, (SELECT O.NAME FROM SYS_ORG O WHERE O.ORGPKVALUE = RFI.PERTAINAREAID) AS PERTAINAREANAME, RFI.WF_STATE, RFI.DECISION_COMMIT_TIME, RFR.CREATE_DATE , RFR.CONTROLLER_VAL FROM RCM_PRE_INFO RFI, RCM_PRE_REPORT RFR WHERE RFI.STAGE in ('4','5','6','7') AND RFI.wf_state = '2' AND RFR.BUSINESSID = RFI.BUSINESSID and RFI.REVIEWPERSONID=#{psfzr} ) t where 1 = 1 and t.projectName like '%${projectName}%' and t.createby like '%${createBy}%' and t.pertainareaName like '%${pertainareaname}%' order by ${orderBy}
mapper.update: update rcm_pre_info r set r.stage = #{stage}, r.decision_commit_time = #{decision_commit_time,jdbcType=DATE} where r.businessid = #{businessid}
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(R.APPLY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') FROM RCM_PRE_INFO R WHERE R.BUSINESSID = #{businessId}
